name: Color Ball Shifter
description:
we’re bringing you exciting mini games, music, and very exciting new features not seen before.

How to Play
● Tap to choose base color.
● Follow the Ball color pattern to match with base line color.
● Timing and Patience are the keys to victory..
● Beat Every Challenge and get a High Score in Endless
● New Modes and Levels added with each update

Please send all feedback. We'd love to hear from you!
